Name: Beasts Shall Rise
About the game: About the game The 4th Horseman of the apocolapse has unleashed hell on earth. It's down to you to clean up the mess. Beasts Shall Rise is an action packed VR looter shooter roguelike horror with full freedom of movement and immersive AAA quality visuals. Key Features Full freedom of movement Open World Environment Realistic VR environment Creepy as hell itself Vast array of brutal weaponry Limb dismemberment and decapitation Fast paced intense action Jesus radar Weapons While you start off the game with a minimal set of weapons, you will soon discover new weapons along the way that can be swapped out to upgrade your arsenal. But choose wisely and tactically which weapons you decide to pick up and remember where you left them because you only have so many hands. Control Scheme Promising full freedom of movement (no teleporting!) Beasts Shall Rise is a single-player first-person VR shooter which allows you to explore the environment however you choose. The game uses motion controllers and IS DESIGNED TO BE PLAYED WHILE SEATED. Replayability The game is designed to offer an arcade style experience with a high level of replayability. Spawn points and pathways will change on each play meaning no two games will be identical. The game has a full weather system and day night cycle which will change randomly with each game start. The game will adjust it's difficulty on the fly to meet your skill level. The game contains many hidden Easter eggs which are triggered to appear on certain days of the year. Don't play late at night though....or risk finding yourself in Midnight Madness Mode! Hardware Requirements The game is currently designed for Oculus Rift. Oculus Touch controllers required. Minimum spec graphics card is Nvidia GeForce GTX1080. Please ensure you meet the necessary hardware specs before purchase. The game is using OpenXR but as a solo developer I do not have access to all the different VR platforms in order to tune the controls at this time. Other platforms will be supported in time, but currently it's only aimed at Oculus. Health Warning Please DO NOT play Beasts Shall Rise if you suffer from any health issues or are pregnant. This can become a very intense experience and may contain jump scares. Not for the faint hearted! Contains strobing and flickering lights, swearing, smoking, decapitation you name it.
